verses.verse: <S%H4100>Why<s%> do the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H7283>rage,<s%> and the <S%H3816>people<s%> <S%H1897>imagine<s%> a <S%H7385>vain<s%> thing?

The <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H3320>set<s%> themselves, and the <S%H7336>rulers<s%> take <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> saying,
Let us <S%H5423>break<s%> their <S%H4147>bands<s%> asunder, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> away their <S%H5688>cords<s%> from us.
He that <S%H3427>sits<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall <S%H7832>laugh:<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> shall have them in <S%H3932>derision.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> shall he <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them in his <S%H639>wrath,<s%> and <S%H926>vex<s%> them in his sore <S%H2740>displeasure.<s%>
Yet have I <S%H5258>set<s%> my <S%H4428>king<s%> on my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>hill<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
I will <S%H5608>declare<s%> the <S%H2706>decree:<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H559>said<s%> to me, You are my <S%H1121>Son;<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> have I <S%H3205>begotten<s%> you.

<S%H7592>Ask<s%> of me, and I shall <S%H5415>give<s%> you the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> for your <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and the <S%H657>uttermost<s%> parts of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for your <S%H272>possession.<s%>
You shall <S%H7489>break<s%> them with a <S%H7626>rod<s%> of <S%H1270>iron;<s%> you shall <S%H5310>dash<s%> them in pieces like a <S%H3335>potter's<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>
Be <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, O you <S%H4428>kings:<s%> be <S%H3256>instructed,<s%> you <S%H8199>judges<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H5401>Kiss<s%> the <S%H1248>Son,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> he be <S%H599>angry,<s%> and you <S%H6>perish<s%> from the <S%H1870>way,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is <S%H1197>kindled<s%> but a <S%H4592>little.<s%> <S%H835>Blessed<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> they that put their <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.
